body.name: BeltBro Titan No Buckle Elastic Belt For Men — Fits 1.5 Inch Belt Loops, Comfortable and Easy To Use
features: YOUR PANTS WILL NEVER FALL DOWN — All pants and shorts with belt loops are spaced differently. This pack includes 2 small (10") BeltBro which allow you to attach to both sides of the belt loops on your pants. The pair will ensure your pants are secure and comfortable.

EXPERIENCE ULTIMATE COMFORT ALL DAY LONG — Belts dig into your stomach, causing pain and annoyance. With BeltBro Titan, your pants feel secure but you won’t even feel like you’re wearing a belt. The BeltBro allows you to breathe easy and stay comfortable. It's the perfect way to secure your pants without an uncomfortable belt pressing against your stomach.

MADE TO LAST — The BeltBro Titan is made of a soft elastic fiber band with nylon and polyester, integrated into an industrial strength design. It's a far superior, fashionable, and more comfortable way to secure two belt loops together evenly and securely. It’s our strongest model available for Men's pants, it can even support the weight of accessories!

LIGHTWEIGHT AND EASY TO TAKE ON AND OFF — Weighing just 2oz, the BeltBro Titan secures on and off in just seconds. Hate taking off your belt at the airport? No problem! Wear the BeltBro Titan through the airport without any hassle. The 1.5-inch belt BeltBro Titan is made to fit any common mens pants and shorts.

BRING NEW LIFE TO YOUR FAVORITE CLOTHING — Recently lost weight? You don’t have to buy a whole new wardrobe. Use the BeltBro Titan to bring new life to your pants and enjoy wearing your favorite clothing again!
body.description: Welcome To The Belt Bro Community! 50K Happy Customers! BeltBro has helped over 50,000 customers feel more comfortable! Our customers use our buckle-free belt for many unique reasons, and we support all our customer’s individual needs. We’re happy to have a community that is inclusive of all people looking to feel more comfortable in their daily lives. Just attach BeltBro between two of your side belt loops, and secure it into place. You’ll never need to touch it throughout the day. It holds your pants snug, month after month!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Welcome To The Belt Bro Community! 50K Happy Customers! BeltBro has helped over 50,000 customers feel more comfortable! Our customers use our buckle-free belt for many unique reasons, and we support all our customer’s individual needs. We’re happy to have a community that is inclusive of all people looking to feel more comfortable in their daily lives. Just attach BeltBro between two of your side belt loops, and secure it into place. You’ll never need to touch it throughout the day. It holds your pants snug, month after month! Perfect for Every Occasion. Everyday Wear - Wear it every day, without even realizing it Travel - Wear it through the airport without a hitch Casual Wear - Wear it with your favorite pair of jeans Formal Wear - Wear it with your favorite suit and tie

BeltBro Patented Design BeltBro was invented as an alternative to uncomfortable belts that put pressure on the stomach. Our values are to deliver a high quality, rugged and well-built product that performs securely. We take pride in shipping quickly, and responding timely to all your needs. The BeltBro Titan fits 1.5” inch belt loops, standard size for Men’s pants and shorts. It’s ultra light, small and comfortable.

Product Information LIGHTWEIGHT AND EASY TO TAKE ON AND OFF Weighing just 2oz, the BeltBro secures on and off in just seconds. Hate taking off your belt at the airport? No problem! Wear the BeltBro through the airport without any hassle. The 1.5-inch BeltBro is made to fit any common mens pants and shorts. YOUR PANTS WILL NEVER FALL DOWN All pants and shorts with belt loops are spaced differently. Therefore, choose the size you need, and get 2 small (10"), 2 medium (13") or 2 large (16") BeltBro Titan in one pack. This allows you to attach to both sides of the belt loops on your pants, ensuring your pants are secure and comfortable. BRING NEW LIFE TO YOUR FAVORITE CLOTHING The BeltBro Titan is made of a soft elastic fiber band with nylon and polyester, integrated into an industrial strength design. It's a far superior, fashionable, and more comfortable way to secure two belt loops together evenly and securely. It’s our strongest model available for Men's pants, it can even support the weight of accessories!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great belt replacement
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a family member after they were told the leather/metal belt they were using gave them an allergic reaction. This product does everything a belt can without irritating the skin - holding your pants up and making you feel like you're wearing the pants and not it wearing you. The only thing it does not serve is aesthetics but rashes do not fit aesthetics either.Highly recommend! Make sure you follow the measuring guides as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars convenient and easy
reviews.reviewText: Got these for my other half. He refuses to wear a belt but this became a great option and work well! The downfall?.... easy to lose when not in use or undoing. At least for him, it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Turns pants into sweatpants
reviews.reviewText: So far these are more comfortable than a belt, but still a little loose for my preference.Essentially, this is a piece of elastic that is sandwiched into some velco. You use the velco to loop around the belt loops to station it in place, and the center of it is "flexible", making it feel like you are wearing sweatpants instead of dress pants, shorts, or jeans.I'm a big guy (6'5" at size 58), so I've gone through a couple of iterations of getting these "tight" since I got the pair of Beltbros yesterday.It doesn't help that my shorts have elastic "expansion" on the sides for lose/comfort fit (just in front of the pockets on either side), so I'm using velcro and more elastic to reign in the original elastic.I had to go to 3 loops (so the ends skip the middle loop) to get it to feel like my pants weren't going to wardrobe malfunction to the ground unexpectantly, but I fear this will greatly reduce the longevity of this product as the elastic will likely wear out much faster being stretched out to the point it doesn't want to stretch further. This is only day 2, so we'll see (I've got an emergency belt ready for the day the music dies).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently stumbled upon an absolute gem that has revolutionized my daily wardrobe game - the alternative belt with velcro straps. Let me tell you, this thing is not just a belt; it's a velcro wizardry that has made me wonder why I ever tolerated traditional belt buckles.Comfort Beyond Belief: 5/5 StarsFirst off, let's talk comfort. I'm no stranger to the woes of belt buckles digging into my midsection, especially when I'm bending over or, let's be real, enjoying a particularly satisfying meal. This Velcro wonder is a game-changer for us slightly curvier individuals. No more uncomfortable metal rubbing against me – just the gentle, snug embrace of Velcro.No More Buckle Blues:Gone are the days of worrying about awkward buckle bulges ruining the sleek lines of my outfit. The simplicity of two Velcro straps looping seamlessly from left to right is nothing short of genius. It holds my pants up securely without the need for a bulky buckle, giving me a smooth, uninterrupted silhouette. This belt is practically invisible under my clothes – a hidden superhero in my daily ensemble.Flawless Functionality: 5/5 StarsNow, you might think, "Does it really work as well as a traditional belt?" Let me assure you – it's a resounding yes! I've worn this bad boy in all sorts of situations, from casual strolls to more vigorous activities, and not once did it let me down. It's like having a reliable sidekick for your pants – always there when you need it, never getting in the way.In conclusion, this alternative belt with Velcro straps is a waist-saver, a style enhancer, and a comfort champion. If you've ever felt the discomfort of traditional belt buckles, this is your ticket to a whole new level of wardrobe satisfaction. It's a 5-star masterpiece that deserves a place in every closet. Trust me; you won't know how you lived without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A huge benefit for my disabled husband!
reviews.reviewText: Due to a hunting accident years ago that left my husband disabled and he only has the use of his pinky on his left hNd and he has full use of his right hand, and he has a hard time with certain belts and he would get frustrated at times. I ran across these and he started using them the day they came in the mail and loves them. The material is sturdy and he likes that he can lose it or tighten it and it's simple for him. He does Manuel labor and these help keep his pants up and my only mistake is not buying them in multiple colors but they're reasonably priced so we will purchase more.
My husband is very happy with the beltbro. He finds it comfortable to wear and no worries of a belt buckle digging in. He found it held his pants in place without having to make adjustments.
I bought knock off first and you get what you pay for. These are perfect.

reviews.reviewTitle: Need product but not for me
reviews.reviewText: I needed to use two to actually keep pants up, and then pants bunched up. I like the full belt style with no buckle better. Or plain belt made of elastic material and slide buckle to side if stuck in your belly.
I bought the belt bro for my son and he loves them. He is a trades person and hated having to loop his belt everyday but he is very happy now, it must save him all of 15 sec every morning lol…
Like the Velcro and the material is good quality!
